title: My Funded Futures Check website
description: My Funded Futures is a futures firm based in the United States, established in November 2023. It offers a 1 Step evaluation program. Account sizes range from $25,000 to $150,000. Supported platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, Volsys, Volbook, ATAS Orderflow Trading and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: 2% Price Limit Rule: No trading within 2% of CME price limit.
Cross Instrument Policy: Single instrument limits apply. Deliberate bypass = breach.

payout_policy.processing_time: Instant approval (6-12 business hours if manual review).
payout_policy.details: Pro: 80% split, every 14 days. Max $100K Sim stage. Flex: 80/20, 5 winning days, max 50% up to $3-5K. Rapid: 90%, daily after buffer, no consistency rule.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed if own strategies, not exploiting simulator fills. CME guidelines for live.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Automated strategies allowed (no simulator exploitation). CME rules for live.
firm_rules.inactivity_rule: 7 days cycle - 1 trade per 7 days to stay active.
firm_rules.news_trading: Prohibited: Exploiting news volatility (straddles/strangles). T1 news: Pro/Rapid can't trade 2 mins before/after. Flex unrestricted.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Not allowed. Auto-close at 4:10 PM EST (no breach).
forbidden_strategies: 2% Price Limit Rule: No trading within 2% of CME price limit.
Cross Instrument Policy: Single instrument limits apply. Deliberate bypass = breach.

seo_content:
My Funded Futures Technical Infrastructure

My Funded Futures is a futures firm based in the United States, established in November 2023. It offers a 1 Step evaluation program. Account sizes range from $25,000 to $150,000. Supported platforms include Tradovate, TradingView, Quantower, Volumetrica Trading, Volsys, Volbook, ATAS Orderflow Trading and NinjaTrader. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
